DataElement.preferredName: General Surgical Complication Peripheral Vascular Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of  peripheral vascular complication related to surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Generalized Surgical Procedure Complication Peripheral Blood Vessel
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._A blood vessel located in the following sites: upper extremities, lower extremities, lower abdomen, head, or neck.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: A blood vessel located in the following sites: upper extremities, lower extremities, lower abdomen, head, or neck.

Concepts.definition: A blood vessel located in the following sites: upper extremities, lower extremities, lower abdomen, head, or neck.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A blood clot in a deep vein, predominantly in the lower extremity, but may include the pelvis or upper extremity.

Concepts.definition: A blood clot in a deep vein, predominantly in the lower extremity, but may include the pelvis or upper extremity.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
